short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gratitude Tabs - Take your browser up a notch

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Web Search Results are provided by Bing.

Choose from magnificient Gratitude images that wow. Select and save your favorite anytime.

This extension allows you to set your New Tab Background to an gratitude themed background as well as new custom search on your new tab.

Choose from one of several beautiful gratitude themed images.

Change your selection at any time with an easy to use settings page.
